con:request.name: Lookup Code - Update
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <LookupCodesRequest> <header> <routing>JMS:rmt2.queue.addressbook</routing> <application>addressbook</application> <module>lookup</module> <transaction>UPDATE_LOOKUP_CODE</transaction> <delivery_mode>XXXXXXX</delivery_mode> <message_mode>REQUEST</message_mode> <delivery_date>06/22/2018 15:51:33</delivery_date> </header> <detail_codes label="Label Test"> <code_id>${LookupCodeID}</code_id> <group_id>${LookupGroupID}</group_id> <shortdesc>LCTEST</shortdesc> <longdesc>Lookup Code Description Test Update</longdesc> </detail_codes> </LookupCodesRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
